'''Mark Lathrop''' (born 1950) is a Canadian [[Biostatistics|Biostatistician]]. He headed the  [[Center for the Study of Human Polymorphisms]], but returned to Canada as Scientific Director at McGill University and Genome Quebec's Innovation Centre in 2011.<ref>{{cite web | url=http://publications.mcgill.ca/reporter/2011/02/lathrop-takes-helm-of-genome-innovation-centre/| title=Lathrop takes helm of genome Innovation Centre|accessdate=2012-12-21}}</ref>
